title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to requests for access to, or amendment or correction of records
maintained by the Office of Mental Health. (b) Nothing in this Part shall require OMH to
grant access to or amend or correct any record not otherwise required by the

Personal Privacy Protection Law, such as a clinical record or attorney's work
product or material prepared for litigation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
520.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
